hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: api
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: the url for the api calls

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
mkdir ${datasetId} cp concepts.csv ./${datasetId}/
#concept insert echo "Creating Concepts" IFS='œÜ' csvcut -z 10000000 -d 'œÜ' -c 1,2,3,4,5,6 ${datasetId}/concepts.csv | csvformat -u0 -U3 -Qüêç -z 10000000 -D 'œÜ' >${datasetId}/concept_table.csv #core concept entry while read datasetRef name display conceptType conceptPath parentPath; do if [[ ${datasetRef} != 'datasetRef' ]]; then #add/update concept curl --show-error --silent --request PUT --data-urlencode "datasetRef=${datasetRef}" --data-urlencode "name=${name}" \ --data-urlencode "display=${display}" --data-urlencode "conceptType=${conceptType}" \ --data-urlencode "conceptPath=${conceptPath}" --data-urlencode "parentPath=${parentPath}" \ ${api}/concept #connect concept to dataset facet curl --show-error --silent --request PUT --data-urlencode "facetName=${datasetRef}" --data-urlencode "conceptPath=${conceptPath}" ${api}/facet/concept #connect concept to data type facet curl --show-error --silent --request PUT --data-urlencode "facetName=${conceptType}" --data-urlencode "conceptPath=${conceptPath}" ${api}/facet/concept fi done <${datasetId}/concept_table.csv
#concept meta entry echo "Creating Concept Meta" csvcut -d 'œÜ' -z 10000000 -c 5,7- ${datasetId}/concepts.csv | csvformat -u0 -U3 -Qüêç -z 10000000 -D 'œÜ' >${datasetId}/concept_meta_table.csv export columncount=$(csvcut -d 'œÜ' -z 10000000 -n ${datasetId}/concept_meta_table.csv | wc -l) for ((i = 2; i < ${columncount} + 1; i++)); do keyname=$(csvcut -d 'œÜ' -z 10000000 -c ${i} ${datasetId}/concept_meta_table.csv | csvcut -z 10000000 -n | cut -c6-) csvcut -d 'œÜ' -z 10000000 -c 1,${i} ${datasetId}/concept_meta_table.csv | csvformat -u0 -U3 -Qüêç -z 10000000 -D 'œÜ' >${datasetId}/concept_meta_column.csv while read conceptPath values; do if [[ ${conceptPath} != 'conceptPath' ]]; then if [[ ! -z ${values} ]]; then export encodedConceptPath=$(echo -n $conceptPath | jq -sRr @uri) export encodedKeyName=$(echo -n $keyname | jq -sRr @uri) echo $values > ${datasetId}/concept_meta_values.txt curl --show-error --silent --request PUT --header 'Content-Type: text/plain' \ --data @${datasetId}/concept_meta_values.txt "${api}/concept/metadata?conceptPath=${encodedConceptPath}&key=${encodedKeyName}" fi fi done <${datasetId}/concept_meta_column.csv done
